name: The Ronin
description:
Ronin is a simple platform game focused only on climbing a tower. The player controls a renegade cursed samurai, where his curse gradually drains his life. Defeat enemies to stay alive and reach the top to break his curse

Ronin is a project that I intend to improve and make better. That's why I count on your help. This game is free and will always be (at least this version). But you can support me by donating any value or promoting the game. If you find any bug, please let me know in the comments.
Thanks for downloading and playing this game.
I really hope you like it and have fun.
